title: Vera Wang serif wedding invitation typeface -- HELP!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330095940im_/http:/typophile.com/cms/files/verawangfont_3782.jpg)
  
This looks so hauntingly familiar... anyone recognize it?
 [‹ Type ID - Please](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330095940/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56330 "Go to previous forum topic") [qapture font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330095940/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56326 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lilyfirecracker

comments.content: It’s [Serlio](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330095940/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/serlio_std_regular/&sample_text=Together%20Stacy) but no bold weights exist. Probably been outlined:(
